datasetclassification.name: dataset_gt_param
datasetclassification.description: Path of the ground truth .json file.

datasetclassification.name: proposals_path
datasetclassification.description:
Path of the proposals directory.
(default is None)

datasetclassification.name: observations_set_name
datasetclassification.description:
Name of the data set.
(default is 'test')

datasetclassification.name: observations_abs_path
datasetclassification.description:
Path of the observation directory.
(default is None)

datasetclassification.name: result_saving_path
datasetclassification.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

datasetclassification.name: similar_classes
datasetclassification.description:
List of groups of ids of categories which are similar to each other.
(default is None)

datasetclassification.name: properties_file
datasetclassification.description:
The name of the file used to store the names of and values of the properties and the names of the categories.
(default is 'properties.json')

datasetclassification.name: for_analysis
datasetclassification.description:
Indicates whether the properties and the predictions have to be loaded. If False, only the ground truth is loaded.
(default is True)

datasetclassification.name: match_on_filename
datasetclassification.description:
Indicates whether the predictions refer to the ground truth by file_name (set to True) or by id (set to False).
(default is False)

datasetclassification.name: save_graphs_as_png
datasetclassification.description:
Indicates whether plots should be saved as .png images.
(default is True)

datasetlocalization.name: dataset_gt_param
datasetlocalization.description: Path of the ground truth .json file.

datasetlocalization.name: task_type
datasetlocalization.description:
Problem task type. It can be:
TaskType.OBJECT_DETECTION, TaskType.INSTANCE_SEGMENTATION.

datasetlocalization.name: proposals_path
datasetlocalization.description:
Path of the proposals directory.
(default is None)

datasetlocalization.name: images_set_name
datasetlocalization.description:
Name of the data set.
(default is 'test')

datasetlocalization.name: images_abs_path
datasetlocalization.description:
Path of the images directory.
(default is None)

datasetlocalization.name: result_saving_path
datasetlocalization.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

datasetlocalization.name: similar_classes
datasetlocalization.description:
List of groups of ids of categories which are similar to each other.
(default is None)

datasetlocalization.description:
The name of the file used to store the names of and values of the properties and the names of the categories.
(default is 'properties.json')

datasetlocalization.name: for_analysis
datasetlocalization.description:
Indicates whether the properties and the predictions have to be loaded. If False, only the ground truth is loaded.
(default is True)

datasetlocalization.name: match_on_filename
datasetlocalization.description:
Indicates whether the predictions refer to the ground truth by file_name (set to True) or by id (set to False).
(default is False)

datasetlocalization.name: save_graphs_as_png
datasetlocalization.description:
Indicates whether plots should be saved as .png images.
(default is True)

datasetcams.name: dataset_gt_param
datasetcams.description: Path of the ground truth .json file.

datasetcams.name: cams_path
datasetcams.description:
Path of the CAMs directory.
(default is None)

datasetcams.name: annotation_type
datasetcams.description:
Indicates whether the annotation is a bounding box (AnnotationType.BBOX) or a segmentation mask (AnnotationType.SEGMENTATION)
(default is AnnotationType.BBOX)

datasetcams.name: proposals_path
datasetcams.description:
Path of the proposals directory.
(default is None)

datasetcams.name: observations_set_name
datasetcams.description:
Name of the data set.
(default is 'test')

datasetcams.name: observations_abs_path
datasetcams.description:
Path of the observation directory.
(default is None)

datasetcams.name: result_saving_path
datasetcams.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

datasetcams.name: similar_classes
datasetcams.description:
List of groups of ids of categories which are similar to each other.
(default is None)

datasetcams.name: properties_file
datasetcams.description:
The name of the file used to store the names of and values of the properties and the names of the categories.
(default is 'properties.json')

datasetcams.name: for_analysis
datasetcams.description:
Indicates whether the properties and the predictions have to be loaded. If False, only the ground truth is loaded.
(default is True)

datasetcams.name: match_on_filename
datasetcams.description:
Indicates whether the predictions refer to the ground truth by file_name (set to True) or by id (set to False).
(default is False)

datasetcams.name: save_graphs_as_png
datasetcams.description:
Indicates whether plots should be saved as .png images.
(default is True)

analyzerclassification.name: classifier_name
analyzerclassification.description: Name of the classifier. It is used as folder to save results.

analyzerclassification.name: dataset
analyzerclassification.description: Dataset used to perform the analysis.

analyzerclassification.name: result_saving_path
analyzerclassification.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

analyzerclassification.name: use_normalization
analyzerclassification.description:
Indicates whether normalisation should be used.
(default is False)

analyzerclassification.name: norm_factor_categories
analyzerclassification.description:
Normalisation factor for the categories. If not specified, the default value is 1/number_of_categories.
(default is None)

analyzerclassification.name: norm_factors_properties
analyzerclassification.description:
Normalization factor for the properties. Each pair (property_name, value) specifies the normalisation factor to be applied to a specific property. If not specified, for each property the default value is 1/number_of_property_values.
(default is None)

analyzerclassification.name: conf_thresh
analyzerclassification.description:
Confidence threshold. All the predictions with a confidence value less than the threshold are ignored.
If not specified, for single-label classification problems, the default value is 0.
If not specified, for binary and multi-label classification problems the default value is 0.5.
(default is None)

analyzerclassification.name: metric
analyzerclassification.description:
The evaluation metric that will be used as default.
(default is Metrics.F1_SCORE)

analyzerclassification.name: save_graphs_as_png
analyzerclassification.description:
Indicates whether plots should be saved as .png images.
(default is True)

analyzerlocalization.name: detector_name
analyzerlocalization.description: Name of the detector. It is used as folder to save results.

analyzerlocalization.name: dataset
analyzerlocalization.description: Dataset used to perform the analysis.

analyzerlocalization.name: result_saving_path
analyzerlocalization.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

analyzerlocalization.name: use_normalization
analyzerlocalization.description:
Indicates whether normalisation should be used.
(default is False)

analyzerlocalization.name: norm_factor_categories
analyzerlocalization.description:
Normalisation factor for the categories. If not specified, the default value is 1/number_of_categories.
(default is None)

analyzerlocalization.name: norm_factors_properties
analyzerlocalization.description:
Normalization factor for the properties. Each pair (property_name, value) specifies the normalisation factor to be applied to a specific property. If not specified, for each property the default value is 1/number_of_property_values.
(default is None)

analyzerlocalization.name: iou
analyzerlocalization.description:
Intersection Over Union threshold. All the predictions with a iou value less than the threshold are considered False Positives. If not specified, the default value is 0.5.
(default is None)

analyzerlocalization.name: conf_thresh
analyzerlocalization.description:
Confidence threshold. All the predictions with a confidence value less than the threshold are ignored.
If not specified, the default value is 0.5.
(default is None)

analyzerlocalization.name: metric
analyzerlocalization.description:
The evaluation metric that will be used as default.
(default is Metrics.Metrics.AVERAGE_PRECISION_SCORE)

analyzerlocalization.name: save_graphs_as_png
analyzerlocalization.description:
Indicates whether plots should be saved as .png images.
(default is True)

analyzercams.name: classifier_name
analyzercams.description: Name of the classifier. It is used as folder to save results.

analyzercams.name: dataset
analyzercams.description: Dataset used to perform the analysis.

analyzercams.name: cam_thresh
analyzercams.description:
CAM confidence threshold. All the pixels with a confidence value less than the threshold are ignored.
(default is 0.5)

analyzercams.name: cam_coverage_thresh
analyzercams.description:
CAM coverage threshold. All the CAMs with a iou less than the threshold do not cover the annotation.
(default is 0.5)

analyzercams.name: result_saving_path
analyzercams.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

analyzercams.name: use_normalization
analyzercams.description:
Indicates whether normalisation should be used.
(default is False)

analyzercams.name: norm_factor_categories
analyzercams.description:
Normalisation factor for the categories. If not specified, the default value is 1/number_of_categories.
(default is None)

analyzercams.name: norm_factors_properties
analyzercams.description:
Normalization factor for the properties. Each pair (property_name, value) specifies the normalisation factor to be applied to a specific property. If not specified, for each property the default value is 1/number_of_property_values.
(default is None)

analyzercams.name: conf_thresh
analyzercams.description:
Confidence threshold. All the predictions with a confidence value less than the threshold are ignored.
If not specified, the default value is 0.5.
(default is None)

analyzercams.name: metric
analyzercams.description:
The evaluation metric that will be used as default.
(default is Metrics.Metrics.CAM_GLOBAL_IOU)

analyzercams.name: save_graphs_as_png
analyzercams.description:
Indicates whether plots should be saved as .png images.
(default is True)

comparatorclassification.name: dataset_gt_param
comparatorclassification.description: Path of the ground truth .json file.

comparatorclassification.name: multiple_proposals_path
comparatorclassification.description:
List of the models proposals path. For each model, it must be specified the model name and the model proposals path directory; optionally can be specified also the default confidence threshold.
Example:
multiple_proposals_path = [['model_a', 'model_a_path', 0.65], ['model_b', 'model_b_path']]

comparatorclassification.name: result_saving_path
comparatorclassification.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

comparatorclassification.name: properties_file
comparatorclassification.description:
The name of the file used to store the names of and values of the properties and the names of the categories.
(default is 'properties.json')

comparatorclassification.name: use_normalization
comparatorclassification.description:
Indicates whether normalisation should be used.
(default is False)

comparatorclassification.name: norm_factor_categories
comparatorclassification.description:
Normalisation factor for the categories. If not specified, the default value is 1/number_of_categories.
(default is None)

comparatorclassification.name: norm_factors_properties
comparatorclassification.description:
Normalization factor for the properties. Each pair (property_name, value) specifies the normalisation factor to be applied to a specific property. If not specified, for each property the default value is 1/number_of_property_values.
(default is None)

comparatorclassification.name: conf_thresh
comparatorclassification.description:
Confidence threshold. All the predictions with a confidence value less than the threshold are ignored.
If not specified, for single-label classification problems, the default value is 0.
If not specified, for binary and multi-label classification problems the default value is 0.5.
(default is None)

comparatorclassification.name: metric
comparatorclassification.description:
The evaluation metric that will be used as default.
(default is Metrics.F1_SCORE)

comparatorclassification.name: similar_classes
comparatorclassification.description:
List of groups of ids of categories which are similar to each other.
(default is None)

comparatorclassification.name: match_on_filename
comparatorclassification.description:
Indicates whether the predictions refer to the ground truth by file_name (set to True) or by id (set to False).
(default is False)

comparatorclassification.name: save_graphs_as_png
comparatorclassification.description:
Indicates whether plots should be saved as .png images.
(default is True)

comparatorcams.name: dataset_gt_param
comparatorcams.description: Path of the ground truth .json file.

comparatorcams.name: multiple_proposals_path
comparatorcams.description:
List of the models proposals path. For each model, it must be specified the model name and the model cams path directory; optionally can be specified also the predictions_path and the default confidence threshold.
Example:
multiple_proposals_path = [['model_a', ['model_a_cam_path', 'model_a_path'], 0.65], ['model_b', ['model_b_cam_path', 'model_b_path'], 0.45]]

comparatorcams.name: cam_thresh
comparatorcams.description:
CAM confidence threshold. All the pixels with a confidence value less than the threshold are ignored.
(default is 0.5)

comparatorcams.name: cam_coverage_thresh
comparatorcams.description:
CAM coverage threshold. All the CAMs with a iou less than the threshold do not cover the annotation.
(default is 0.5)

comparatorcams.name: annotation_type
comparatorcams.description:
Indicates whether the annotation is a bounding box (AnnotationType.BBOX) or a segmentation mask (AnnotationType.SEGMENTATION)
(default is AnnotationType.BBOX)

comparatorcams.name: result_saving_path
comparatorcams.description:
Path used to save results.
(default is './results/')

comparatorcams.name: properties_file
comparatorcams.description:
The name of the file used to store the names of and values of the properties and the names of the categories.
(default is 'properties.json')

comparatorcams.name: use_normalization

(default is False)

comparatorcams.name: norm_factor_categories
comparatorcams.description:

(default is None)

comparatorcams.name: norm_factors_properties
comparatorcams.description:

(default is None)

comparatorcams.name: conf_thresh
comparatorcams.description:
Confidence threshold. All the predictions with a confidence value less than the threshold are ignored.
If not specified, for single-label classification problems, the default value is 0.
If not specified, for binary and multi-label classification problems the default value is 0.5.
(default is None)

comparatorcams.name: metric
comparatorcams.description:
The evaluation metric that will be used as default.
(default is Metrics.CAM_GLOBAL_IOU)

comparatorcams.name: similar_classes
comparatorcams.description:
List of groups of ids of categories which are similar to each other.
(default is None)

comparatorcams.name: match_on_filename
comparatorcams.description:
